resources.string: I Joined Swansea To Get More Game Time, Claims Former Liverpool Midfielder Jonjo Shelvy
via Facebook messenger so they can Huddle with you!

Hi, I\'ve started a Huddle about \"I Joined Swansea To Get More Game Time, Claims Former Liverpool Midfielder Jonjo Shelvy\". I\'d like you to join in via fanatix, the mobile sports network. Please follow the link and get the app! \nIan
